t: Greencore Group 2025 Company Profile: Stock Performance & Earnings | PitchBook
s: Greencore Group PLC is a convenience food manufacturer that supplies chilled and frozen food to customers based in U.K. and the U.S. The company's operating business segment is Convenience Foods, and it geographically operates in UK & Ireland.

t: Greencore in Amazon deal boost as profits slump 74pc - Independent.ie
s: November 29, 2017 - Greencore has struck a deal with Amazon to provide meal kits and sandwiches to the US giant's online grocery delivery service, according to sources. t: Sandwich maker Greencore warns on profits as US business runs into trouble
s: Greencore, which makes around half of all sandwiches at brands on Britain’s high streets, entered the US market in 2008 but found it difficult to expand the business to any scale.
